name: Library of the Returnee
description:
A library of stories exist. At the moment, just the beginning of one story is available to read.  Saving during stories is currently disabled, but will be back shortly. Optional settings  (fullscreen, window resolution, audio) are currently saved and will need to be set before you click the button labeled "New" on the title screen.

Instructions:

Click the button labeled "New" to start a story. Then click the button labeled "Explore" in the middle of the screen and wait until the bar fills up to the max. Read the text in the box above the button once it appears after the bar has filled up. Sometimes choices appear as buttons on the left side of the screen, you will need to click the button of the choice you want to see as the next event before being able to proceed with "Explore" again.

Press F11 to enter or exit full screen.

Press the "ESC" key to quit.
